item.title: Han Byung-do, who previously said there were 'differences of opinion' on the 'Public Prosecution Service Act,' says "no differences" after meeting with Woo Sang-ho at the Blue House (‘공소청법’ 당정 이견 있다던 한병도, 靑 우상호 만난뒤 “이견 없다”)
item.description:
Han Byung-do, who previously said there were 'differences of opinion' on the 'Public Prosecution Service Act,' says "no differences" after meeting with Woo Sang-ho at the Blue House (‘공소청법’ 당정 이견 있다던 한병도, 靑 우상호 만난뒤 “이견 없다”)

Han Byung-do, the newly elected floor leader of the Democratic Party of Korea, changed his statement regarding the Serious Crimes Investigation Office (SCIO) and Public Prosecution Service Act announced by the government on the 12th, the day after his election. He initially said there were "differences of opinion between the government and lawmakers," but later stated there were "no differences between the party and the government." The Blue House reconfirmed, saying, "Floor Leader Han acknowledged it was his mistake," and "there are no differences." An interpretation has emerged that this is an attempt to manage traffic as hardline lawmakers strongly protested, calling the government proposal "regression, not reform." (더불어민주당 한병도 신임 원내대표가 당선 다음 날인 12일 정부가 발표한 중수청·공소청 법안과 관련해 “정부와 의원들 간에 이견이 있다”고 했다가 “당정 간 이견이 없다”고 말을 바꿨다. 청와대는 “한 원내대표가 본인이 실수한 것이라고 인정했다”며 “이견은 없다”고 재확인했다. 강경파 의원들이 “정부안은 개혁 아닌 퇴행”이라며 강하게 반발하자 교통정리에 들어간 것이란 해석이 나온다.)

Floor Leader Han appeared on Kim Eo-jun's YouTube channel this morning and stated that over 30 party lawmakers were raising issues with the government proposal. He said, "The government's position is to discuss later whether to grant supplementary investigation authority to Public Prosecution Service prosecutors, while lawmakers argue that 'supplementary investigation authority should be abolished from the start, leaving no room.'" He added, "It seems we need to talk quickly because there are differences of opinion between the government and lawmakers." When asked if the SCIO prosecutors directing investigations would essentially make it a small external office of the prosecution, Han replied, "There is such a concern." This acknowledged differences of opinion between the party and the government. (한 원내대표는 이날 오전 김어준씨 유튜브에 나와 당내 30명 넘는 의원들이 정부안에 문제를 제기하고 있다고 했다. 그러면서 “정부는 공소청 검사에게 보완 수사권을 부여할지 여부를 추후 논의하자는 입장인 반면 의원들은 ‘처음부터 보완 수사권을 폐지해 일말의 여지를 주면 안 된다’는 주장”이라고 했다. 이어 “정부와 의원들 간 이견이 있어서 빨리 얘기해야 할 것 같다”고도 했다. 한 원내대표는 ‘중수청 검사가 수사를 지휘하게 되면 검찰청의 작은 외청이 되는 것 아니냐’는 취지의 질문에도 “그런 우려가 있다”고 했다. 당정 간 이견이 있다는 걸 인정한 것이다.)

However, after meeting with Woo Sang-ho, the Blue House Senior Secretary for Political Affairs, who visited the National Assembly in the afternoon, Han told reporters, "There are no differences between the party and the government," and that "lawmakers have their own thoughts and are at a stage of expressing their positions." On Facebook, he also wrote, "There are no differences," and "The intent of my remarks was for the Ministry of Justice, the Legislation and Judiciary Committee, the party's floor, and the Policy Committee to gather, fully discuss, and coordinate these opinions." (하지만 한 원내대표는 이날 오후 국회로 찾아온 우상호 청와대 정무수석을 만난 뒤 취재진에게 “당정 이견은 없다”며 “의원들이 생각하는 바가 있어 자기 주장을 펴는 단계”라고 했다. 페이스북에도 “이견은 없다”며 “제 발언의 취지는 이러한 의견들을 법무부·법사위·원내·정책위가 함께 모여 충분히 논의하고 조율하자는 것”이라고 썼다.)

Kim Byung-wook, the Blue House Senior Secretary for Political Affairs, also stated in a briefing around the same time, "While there are various opinions among party lawmakers regarding prosecution reform, including the SCIO and Public Prosecution Service, I clearly state there are no differences between the party and the government." This appears to be an intention to minimize discord between the party and the government surrounding the government proposal. (김병욱 청와대 정무비서관도 비슷한 시각 브리핑에서 “당내 다양한 의원 사이에서 검찰개혁, 그 가운데 중수청·공소청과 관련한 여러 의견이 있지만 당정 간 이견은 없다는 말씀을 분명히 드린다”고 했다. 정부안을 둘러싼 당정 간 불협화음을 최소화하겠다는 의도로 보인다.)

Hardline lawmakers from the Democratic Party and the Cho Kuk Innovation Party have been arguing for a full review even before the official announcement of the government proposal, stating that "allowing supplementary investigation authority for Public Prosecution Service prosecutors is not prosecution reform." They also oppose the government's plan to structure the SCIO with a dual system of legally trained 'investigative judicial officers' and non-legally trained 'professional investigators,' calling it "an organization no different from the current prosecution." Cho Kuk Innovation Party lawmaker Hwang Un-ha even demanded the resignation of Bong Wook, the Blue House Senior Secretary for Civil Affairs, who has been leading the government proposal. (민주당과 조국혁신당 강경파 의원들은 정부안이 공식 발표되기 전부터 “공소청 검사에 보완 수사권을 허용하는 건 검찰 개혁이 아니다”라며 전면 재검토를 주장해왔다. 또 정부가 중수청 구성을 법률가인 ‘수사 사법관’과 비법률가인 ‘전문 수사관’으로 이원화하기로 한 데 대해서도 “지금의 검찰과 다를 바 없는 조직”이라며 반발하고 있다. 조국혁신당 황운하 의원은 이날 정부안을 주도해 온 봉욱 청와대 민정수석에게 사퇴를 요구하기도 했다.)

item.title: Appointment of Floor Leader Han Byung-do's Leadership Team... Spokesperson, Vice Floor Leaders, Chief of Staff, and Others from Kim Byung-gi's System Largely Retained (與 한병도 원내대표단 인선...대변인·부대표·비서실장 등 김병기 체제 대거 유임)
item.description:
Appointment of Floor Leader Han Byung-do's Leadership Team... Spokesperson, Vice Floor Leaders, Chief of Staff, and Others from Kim Byung-gi's System Largely Retained (與 한병도 원내대표단 인선...대변인·부대표·비서실장 등 김병기 체제 대거 유임 )

Han Byung-do, the new floor leader of the Democratic Party of Korea, announced additional appointments for his floor leadership team on the 13th, including retaining Representative Lee Ki-heon as the floor leader's chief of staff. (더불어민주당 한병도 신임 원내대표는 13일 원내대표 비서실장에 이기헌 의원을 유임하는 등 원내대표단 인사를 추가 발표했다.)

The floor spokespersons will also remain the same, with Representatives Kim Hyun-jung, Moon Geum-ju, and Baek Seung-ah continuing in their roles. Among the total of 18 vice floor leaders, nine were retained: Representatives Kim Ki-pyo, Kim Moon-soo, Kim Jun-hyuk, Park Yong-gap, Park Hong-bae, Oh Se-hee, Lee Hoon-ki, Jeon Jin-sook, and Jo In-cheol. (원내대변인도 김현정·문금주·백승아 의원이 그대로 맡는다. 원내부대표 총 18명 가운데서도 김기표·김문수·김준혁·박용갑·박홍배·오세희·이훈기·전진숙·조인철 의원 등 9명은 유임됐다.)

Newly appointed vice floor leaders are Representatives Kim Dong-ah, Kim Sung-hoe, Park Min-gyu, Ahn Tae-joon, Lee Sang-sik, Lee Yong-woo, Lee Jung-heon, and Lee Joo-hee. (김동아·김성회·박민규·안태준·이상식·이용우·이정헌·이주희 의원은 새로 임명됐다.)

Representative Kim Nam-geun, who had served as the newly created vice floor leader for people's livelihood in former floor leader Kim Byung-gi's team, was also appointed as a vice floor leader. (김병기 전 원내대표단에서 신설된 민생부대표를 맡았던 김남근 의원도 원내부대표로 선임됐다.)

Floor Leader Han Byung-do had previously appointed Cheon Jun-ho as senior vice floor leader for floor operations, Kim Han-gyu as senior vice floor leader for policy, and Jeon Yong-gi as senior vice floor leader for communication the day before. Floor Leader Han, who succeeded former floor leader Kim Byung-gi after his resignation over various allegations of misconduct including receiving nomination-related funds, has a term of approximately four months until mid-May this year. (한병도 원내대표는 전날 천준호 원내운영수석부대표, 김한규 원내정책수석부대표, 전용기 원내소통수석부대표를 각각 임명했다. 한 원내대표는 공천헌금 수수 등 각종 비위 의혹으로 물러난 김병기 전 원내대표의 후임으로, 올 5월 중순까지 4개월가량이 임기다.)

item.title: Prosecution's Supplementary Investigation Authority to Be Discussed Later Amid Hardliner Backlash (강경파 반발에 보완수사권은 추후 논의키로)
item.description:
Prosecution's Supplementary Investigation Authority to Be Discussed Later Amid Hardliner Backlash (강경파 반발에 보완수사권은 추후 논의키로)

On the 12th, while unveiling the bill to establish the Public Prosecution Service and the Major Crimes Investigation Agency, the government stated regarding the contentious issue of the 'Public Prosecution Service's supplementary investigation authority' that it would "be discussed later." (정부는 12일 공소청과 중대범죄수사청(중수청) 설치 법안을 공개하면서 최대 쟁점이었던 ‘공소청의 보완사수권’ 문제에 대해선 “추후 논의할 것”이라고 밝혔다.)

The government-proposed Public Prosecution Service Act announced that day stipulates that 'the duties of prosecutors shall be governed by matters pertaining to the Criminal Procedure Act.' Since Article 196 of the current Criminal Procedure Act specifies 'the prosecutor's authority for supplementary investigation regarding cases transferred by the police,' if the Public Prosecution Service Act takes effect as is, prosecutors in the Public Prosecution Service would possess supplementary investigation authority. Hardliner lawmakers from the ruling party and its strong supporters are strongly opposing this. The Cho Kuk Innovation Party has also joined this opposition. (이날 발표된 공소청법 정부안에는 ‘검사의 직무 수행은 형사소송법에 속하는 사항으로 규정한다’고 돼 있다. 현행 형사소송법 196조가 ‘경찰 송치 사건에 대한 검사의 보완수사권’을 명시하고 있어, 공소청법이 그대로 발효되면 공소청 검사가 보완수사권을 갖게 된다. 이에 대해 여당의 강경파 의원들과 강성 지지층은 강하게 반발하고 있다. 조국혁신당도 여기에 가세했다.)

The Prosecution Reform Promotion Team under the Prime Minister's Office also appears to be mindful of this backlash. The promotion team stated that day, "Matters related to supplementary investigations for cases transferred among prosecutors' duties are scheduled to be reviewed during the Criminal Procedure Act revision process," adding, "The goal is to prepare a government proposal within the first half of this year." This indicates there are more issues to discuss. (국무총리실 산하 검찰 개혁 추진단도 이런 반발을 의식한 것으로 보인다. 추진단은 이날 “검사의 직무 중 송치받은 사건에 대한 보완 수사 관련 사안은 형사소송법 개정 과정에서 검토할 예정”이라며 “올해 상반기 내에 정부안을 마련하는 것이 목표”라고 밝혔다. 더 논의할 사안이란 것이다.)

There were also related questions and answers in the National Assembly's Legislation and Judiciary Committee that day. When hardliner Democratic Party lawmaker Kim Yong-min expressed dissatisfaction, saying, 'Prosecutors' opinions are being excessively reflected in the prosecution reform discussions,' Justice Minister Chung Sung-ho responded, "It's not that the entire prosecution is bad or problematic." Previously, the Ministry of Justice had maintained the position that 'it is impossible to decide whether to indict without supplementary investigation,' and the Presidential Office is known to hold a similar view. President Lee Jae-myung said at a press conference marking his 100th day in office last September, "Can the police be trusted? If you dislike maggots, should you get rid of the earthenware jar?" (이날 국회 법제사법위에서도 관련 질의응답이 있었다. 강경파인 김용민 민주당 의원이 ‘검찰 개혁 논의에 검사들의 의견이 과도하게 반영되고 있다’고 불만을 표시하자, 정성호 법무장관은 “검찰 전체가 다 나쁘다거나 문제가 있는 것은 아니다”라고 했다. 그동안 법무부는 ‘보완 수사 없이 기소 여부를 결정하는 것은 불가능하다’는 입장이었고, 청와대도 다르지 않은 것으로 알려졌다. 이재명 대통령은 작년 9월 취임 100일 기자회견에서 “경찰은 믿을 만하냐. 구더기가 싫어도 장독을 없애면 되겠느냐”고 했다.)

Meanwhile, the content regarding 'full-case transfer,' mentioned as another means to control inadequate investigations by the police and others, was not addressed in the government announcement that day. The full-case transfer system proposes that investigative agencies like the police transfer all cases to the Public Prosecution Service regardless of the investigation outcome, such as an opinion for indictment or no charges. (한편, 경찰 등의 부실 수사를 통제할 또 다른 수단으로 거론되는 ‘전건 송치’에 관한 내용은 이날 정부 발표에서 언급되지 않았다. 전건 송치 제도는 경찰 등 수사기관이 기소 의견, 무혐의 등 수사 결과에 상관없이 모든 사건을 공소청에 송치하자는 것이다.)

Since the adjustment of investigative authority between the prosecution and police in 2021, the police have only transferred cases with an opinion for indictment. For non-indictment cases, prosecutors can request a reinvestigation to a limited extent, but the procedure is complex and cumbersome. Justice Minister Chung Sung-ho stated during a parliamentary interpellation session last September, "We will review full-case transfer as a means to check police investigative authority." Observers noted that the omission of 'full-case transfer' from the government announcement that day suggests it "has been pushed aside from the contentious issues." (2021년 검경 수사권 조정 이후 경찰은 기소 의견 사건만 송치했다. 불송치 사건은 검찰이 제한적으로 재수사를 요구할 수는 있지만, 그 절차가 복잡하고 까다롭게 되어 있다. 정성호 법무부 장관은 작년 9월 국회 대정부질문에서 “경찰 수사권 견제 수단으로 전건 송치를 검토하겠다”고 했다. 이날 정부 발표에서 ‘전건 송치’가 빠진 것을 두고 일각에서는 “쟁점에서 밀려났다”는 관측도 나왔다.)

item.title: Amid Supreme Court's 'Rehash' Criticism... Ruling Party Forcibly Advances Stronger 2nd Special Counsel (대법 ‘재탕’ 지적에… 與, 더 센 2차 특검 강행)
item.description:
Amid Supreme Court's 'Rehash' Criticism... Ruling Party Forcibly Advances Stronger 2nd Special Counsel (대법 ‘재탕’ 지적에… 與, 더 센 2차 특검 강행)

Regarding the second comprehensive special counsel investigation (special counsel to uncover the truth about acts of rebellion, foreign aggression, and state affairs manipulation by Yoon Suk-yeol and Kim Keon-hee) being pushed by the Democratic Party of Korea, the Supreme Court's National Court Administration submitted its opinion to the National Assembly earlier this month, stating it "raises concerns of appearing to be an extension of the three major special counsels (rebellion, Kim Keon-hee, deceased Marine)," effectively expressing opposition. In response, the Democratic Party publicly disclosed a 'stronger' revised bill on the 12th, expanding the investigation targets from 14 to 17 items and increasing investigative personnel from 156 to 251 members, and passed it in the National Assembly's Legislation and Judiciary Committee amid a walkout by the People Power Party. (더불어민주당이 추진하고 있는 2차 종합 특검(윤석열·김건희에 의한 내란·외환 및 국정 농단 행위의 진상 규명을 위한 특검)에 대해 대법원 법원행정처가 이달 초 “3대 특검(내란·김건희·순직해병)을 연장하는 것으로 보일 우려가 있다”며 사실상 반대 의견을 국회에 제출했다. 그러자 민주당은 수사 대상을 14가지에서 17가지로 확대하고, 수사 인력을 156명에서 251명으로 늘린 ‘더 센’ 수정안을 12일 공개하고 국민의힘이 퇴장한 가운데 국회 법제사법위원회에서 의결했다.)

The Democratic Party plans to process the revised special counsel bill in the plenary session on the 15th. The investigation period for the second special counsel is up to 170 days. The opposition party commented, "This is to continue the rebellion narrative until the June 4 local elections." (민주당은 수정된 특검법안을 15일 본회의에서 처리한다는 계획이다. 2차 특검의 수사 기간은 최장 170일이다. 야당에선 “6·4 지방선거까지 내란몰이를 이어가겠다는 것”이라고 했다.)

The second special counsel bill processed by the Democratic Party in the Legislation and Judiciary Committee this day is characterized by expanding the investigation targets and personnel compared to the original bill. The original special counsel bill listed 14 investigation targets, including 'suspicion of attempting rebellion/foreign aggression by inducing a North Korean attack through threatening flights near the Northern Limit Line (NLL) with armed helicopters' and 'acts of local governments cooperating with martial law.' These are based on claims by Democratic Party lawmakers of having received tips from the military or fragmentary entries in the 'notebook' of former Defense Security Command Commander Roh Sang-won. Former Commander Roh is already indicted and on trial under the rebellion special counsel. (민주당이 이날 국회 법사위에서 처리한 2차 특검법안은 기존 안보다 수사 대상과 수사 인력을 확대한 것이 특징이다. 기존 특검안은 ‘군이 무장 헬기로 북방한계선(NLL) 인근을 위협 비행해 북한 공격을 유도하는 방식으로 외환·군사 반란을 시도한 혐의’, ‘지방자치단체의 계엄 동조 행위’ 등 14가지를 수사 대상으로 했다. 민주당 의원들이 군에서 제보를 받았다고 주장하거나, 노상원 전 국군정보사령관의 ‘수첩’에 단편적으로 기재된 내용이 근거다. 노 전 사령관은 이미 내란 특검에 의해 기소돼 재판을 받고 있다.)

The revised bill adds suspicions claimed by Democratic Party lawmakers, such as 'suspicions of the Defense Security Command surveilling current/former soldiers and civilians and creating a blacklist,' increasing the investigation targets to 17 items. It also added psychological warfare against North Korea including drones and submarines, and 'various military units' as investigation targets. The original provision allowing investigation into cases discovered during the investigation process and related complaints/reports was maintained. However, suspicions of collusion between the political sphere and the Unification Church, for which President Lee Jae-myung ordered the formation of a special investigation team by prosecutors and police, were excluded. (수정안은 여기에 민주당 의원들이 주장했던 ‘국군방첩사령부의 전현직 군인, 민간인 사찰 및 블랙리스트 작성 의혹’ 등이 추가돼 수사 대상이 17가지로 늘었다. 또 드론, 잠수정을 포함한 대북심리전과 ‘군의 각급 부대’를 수사 대상으로 추가했다. 수사 과정에서 인지된 사건, 관련된 고소·고발 사건도 수사 대상으로 하는 원안도 유지됐다. 다만 이재명 대통령이 검경 특별수사본부 구성을 지시한 통일교 정치권 유착 의혹은 제외됐다.)

The size of the special counsel, originally 156 members in the initial bill, was expanded in the revised bill to 251 members, including 100 special prosecutors and investigators and 145 public officials. The National Assembly Budget Office estimated the budget for a 156-member special counsel at about 15.43 billion won, and with the size increasing by nearly 100 members, costs are expected to rise further. (애초 법안에선 156명 규모였던 특검 규모도 수정안에선 특검과 특별수사관 100명, 공무원 145명 등 251명까지 확대됐다. 국회 예산정책처는 156명 규모 특검을 기준으로 예산을 154억3000여만원으로 추산했는데, 특검 규모가 100명 가까이 늘어나면서 비용이 더 늘어날 전망이다.)

The Democratic Party has publicly stated it would process the second special counsel bill in the plenary session on the 15th. However, earlier this month, the Supreme Court's National Court Administration stated in an opinion submitted to the National Assembly regarding the second special counsel bill that "due to overlap with existing investigations, the efficiency of the special counsel investigation may not be high." While adding the caveat that it is 'a matter for the National Assembly to decide through legislation,' it also said "problems such as investigation delays due to the dispatch of investigative personnel (to the special counsel) may occur." Regarding the Democratic Party's submission of the revised bill expanding investigation targets this day, some in legal circles commented, "Isn't this being conscious of criticism that it's essentially a re-extension and repetition of the three major special counsels?" (민주당은 그간 2차 특검법안을 15일 본회의에서 처리하겠다고 공언해왔다. 하지만 이달 초 대법원 법원행정처는 국회에 제출한 의견서에서 2차 특검법안에 대해 “기존 수사와 중복으로 특검 수사의 효율성이 높지 않을 수 있다”고 했다. 법원행정처는 ‘국회에서 입법으로 결정할 사안’이라는 단서를 달았지만 “수사 인력의 (특검) 파견으로 인한 수사 지연 등 문제가 발생할 수 있다”고 했다. 민주당이 이날 수사 대상 사건을 확대한 수정안을 낸 데 대해 법조계에선 “사실상 3대 특검 재연장이자 반복이라는 비판을 의식한 것 아니냐”는 이야기도 나왔다.)

Democratic Party's newly appointed floor leader Han Byung-do met with People Power Party floor leader Song Eon-seok this day and said, "The task our society must resolve is the rebellion," requesting cooperation in processing the second special counsel. In response, Floor Leader Song said, "I hope they would stop increasing public fatigue and shift direction toward people's livelihoods." (민주당 한병도 신임 원내대표는 이날 송언석 국민의힘 원내대표를 만난 자리에서 “우리 사회가 청산할 과제는 내란”이라며 2차 특검 처리에 협조해 달라고 했다. 이에 대해 송 원내대표는 “더는 국민의 피로를 높이지 말고 민생 쪽으로 방향을 선회했으면 좋겠다”고 했다.)

item.title: Regarding Lee's Mention of 'Harm Caused by Unification Church and Shincheonji'... Religious Circles Say "The Public Would Also Agree to Their Dissolution" (李 ‘통일교·신천지 폐해’ 언급에… 종교계 “국민도 해산 동의”)
item.description:
Regarding Lee's Mention of 'Harm Caused by Unification Church and Shincheonji'... Religious Circles Say "The Public Would Also Agree to Their Dissolution" (李 ‘통일교·신천지 폐해’ 언급에… 종교계 “국민도 해산 동의”)

On the 12th, President Lee Jae-myung invited leaders from seven major religious groups—Buddhism, Protestantism, Catholicism, Won Buddhism, Confucianism, Cheondogyo, and ethnic religions—to the Blue House for a luncheon meeting. At the gathering, when the religious leaders brought up issues concerning the Unification Church and Shincheonji, President Lee stated, "The harm they cause is very great," according to Kang Yu-jeong, the Blue House spokesperson. (이재명 대통령은 12일 불교, 개신교, 천주교, 원불교, 유교, 천도교, 민족종교 등 7대 종단 지도자들을 청와대로 초청해 오찬 간담회를 했다. 이 자리에서 종교 지도자들이 통일교와 신천지 문제를 거론하자, 이 대통령은 “폐해가 매우 크다”고 말했다고 강유정 청와대 대변인이 전했다.)

In a written briefing that day, Spokesperson Kang stated that President Lee and the religious leaders exchanged opinions on issues including Shincheonji and the Unification Church, diplomatic achievements such as the visit to China, low birth rates, balanced regional development, and improvement of inter-Korean relations. The religious leaders reportedly conveyed the gist that "the harm caused by pseudo-cult religions like the Unification Church and Shincheonji is severe," and that "practices causing significant damage to citizens' lives, beyond collusion between religion and politics, should be dealt with strictly." (강 대변인은 이날 서면 브리핑을 통해 이 대통령과 종교 지도자들이 신천지와 통일교 문제, 방중 성과 등 외교 이슈, 저출산, 지방 균형 발전, 남북 관계 개선 등에 대해 의견을 교환했다고 밝혔다. 종교 지도자들은 “통일교와 신천지 등 사이비 이단 종교로 인한 폐해가 심각하다”며 “정교 유착을 넘어 시민들의 삶에 큰 피해를 주는 행태에 대해 엄정하게 다뤄야 한다”는 취지의 이야기를 했다고 한다.)

In response, President Lee expressed sympathy, saying, "It is truly a difficult subject, but the harm is very great because the damage they inflict on our society has been left unaddressed for too long," Spokesperson Kang relayed. Upon hearing this, the attending religious leaders stated, "The dissolution of religious organizations harming the nation and its people is something the public would also agree to," and requested, "Please also consider a plan to use the assets of problematic religious foundations to provide relief to victims of pseudo-religions." (이에 대해 이 대통령은 “참으로 어려운 주제지만 우리 사회에 끼치는 해악을 너무 오래 방치해 폐해가 매우 크다”고 공감했다고 강 대변인은 전했다. 그러자 참석한 종교 지도자들은 “국가와 국민에 해악을 미치는 종교 단체의 해산은 국민들도 동의할 것”이라면서 “문제가 되는 종교 재단의 자산으로 사이비종교 피해자들을 구제하는 방안도 고민해달라”고 요청했다.)

According to the Blue House, the religious leaders also highly evaluated President Lee's mention of anti-China sentiment and hate issues, stating, "Hatred towards immigrants is becoming a breeding ground for fascism," and "Many citizens would agree with the proposal to break away from hatred and division." Earlier, in his opening remarks before the luncheon, President Lee said, "As many people feel, conflict, hatred, and animosity seem to have increased significantly," adding, "They say the most important thing a president must do is unite the people, and while efforts are being made, there are many limitations." (청와대에 따르면 종교 지도자들은 또 이 대통령이 혐중, 혐오 문제를 지적한 것을 높이 평가하면서 “이주민에 대한 혐오가 파시즘의 온상이 되어가고 있다” “혐오와 단절하자는 제안에 많은 국민이 동의할 것”이라고 했다. 앞서 이 대통령은 오찬 전 모두 발언에서 “많은 사람이 느끼는 것처럼 갈등과 혐오, 증오가 참으로 많이 늘어난 것 같다”며 “대통령이 해야 할 제일 중요한 일이 우리 국민을 통합시키는 거라고는 하는데, 노력은 하고 있기는 하지만 한계가 많다”고 했다.)

In response, Venerable Jinwoo, the head of the Jogye Order's administration office who serves as co-chairman of the Korean Religious Leaders Council, replied, "As important as national security is the security of the people's hearts," and "I hope we can continue to cooperate on the common task of ensuring the peace of the people's hearts, the security of the people's hearts," Spokesperson Kang conveyed. (이에 대해 한국종교지도자협의회 공동대표의장을 맡은 조계종 총무원장 진우스님은 “국가 안보만큼이나 중요한 건 국민의 마음 안보”라면서 “국민 마음의 평안, 국민 마음 안보라는 공동 과제를 놓고 지속적으로 협력해 나가길 기대한다”고 화답했다고 강 대변인은 전했다.)

Attending the event from the Buddhist community were Venerable Jinwoo, Venerable Deoksu (head of the Cheontae Order administration), and Venerable Sangjin (head of the Taego Order administration). From the Christian community, Pastor Kim Jeong-seok (representative chairman of the Korean Church Council), Pastor Park Seung-ryeol (general secretary of the National Council of Churches in Korea), and Pastor Ko Gyeong-hwan (representative chairman of the Christian Council of Korea) were present. From the Catholic Church, Archbishop Jeong Soon-taek of the Seoul Archdiocese and Bishop Lee Yong-hoon, chairman of the Catholic Bishops' Conference of Korea, attended. Also present were Na Sang-ho (director of Won Buddhism's Doctrinal Affairs), Choi Jong-su (head of Sungkyunkwan, representing Confucianism), Park In-jun (leader of Cheondogyo), and Kim Ryeong-ha (chairman of the Korean Ethnic Religion Association). (이날 행사에는 불교계에서는 진우스님, 천태종 총무원장 덕수스님, 태고종 총무원장 상진스님이 참석했고 기독교계에서는 한국교회총연합 대표회장 김정석 목사, 한국기독교교회협의회 총무 박승렬 목사, 한국기독교총연합회 대표회장 고경환 목사가 자리했다. 천주교에서는 서울대교구 정순택 대주교와 한국천주교주교회의 의장 이용훈 주교가 참석했으며, 원불교 나상호 교정원장, 유교 최종수 성균관장, 천도교 박인준 교령, 한국민족종교협의회 김령하 회장이 참석했다.)

item.title: President Lee to Host Luncheon Meeting with Ruling and Opposition Party Leaders on the 16th (李대통령, 16일 與野 지도부와 오찬)
item.description:
President Lee to Host Luncheon Meeting with Ruling and Opposition Party Leaders on the 16th (李대통령, 16일 與野 지도부와 오찬)

President Lee Jae-myung will host a luncheon meeting at the Blue House on the 16th, inviting leaders from both the ruling and opposition parties. Although the People Power Party was also invited, a negative atmosphere regarding attendance is strong due to the ongoing confrontation with the ruling party over the special prosecutor law. (이재명 대통령이 16일 여야 지도부를 청와대로 초청해 오찬 회동을 가진다. 국민의힘도 초청했지만, 여당과의 특검법 대치 등으로 참석에 부정적인 기류가 강하다.)

Kim Byung-wook, the Blue House Senior Secretary for Political Affairs, stated in a briefing on the 12th, "This luncheon meeting is planned to share the main directions for state affairs administration in the new year and discuss bipartisan cooperation plans for restoring people's livelihoods and stabilizing state affairs." (김병욱 청와대 정무비서관은 12일 브리핑에서 “이번 오찬 간담회는 새해를 맞아 국정 운영의 주요 방향을 공유하고 민생 회복과 국정 안정을 위한 초당적 협력 방안을 논의할 계획”이라고 말했다.)

The Blue House proposed the luncheon on the 9th to the party leaders and floor leaders of seven ruling and opposition parties, including the Democratic Party of Korea, the People Power Party, the Cho Kuk Innovation Party, the Progressive Party, the Reform New Party, the Basic Income Party, and the Social Democratic Party. However, Park Sung-hoon, the chief spokesperson for the People Power Party, said that day, "We received the proposal, but given that the Democratic Party is processing the special prosecutor law in the National Assembly plenary session the day before (the 15th), we don't think it's appropriate to attend the meeting the next day," adding, "We are viewing (the meeting) negatively." The Reform New Party's leader Lee Jun-seok will be absent due to overseas business, but floor leader Cheon Ha-ram is scheduled to attend. (청와대는 지난 9일 더불어민주당과 국민의힘을 비롯해 조국혁신당, 진보당, 개혁신당, 기본소득당, 사회민주당 등 7개 여야 당대표·원내대표에게 오찬을 제안했다. 그러나 이날 박성훈 국민의힘 수석대변인은 “제안받긴 했지만, 민주당이 전날(15일) 국회 본회의에서 특검법을 처리한다고 하는데 다음 날 간담회에 가는 게 맞지 않다고 생각한다”며 “(회동에 대해) 부정적으로 보고 있다”고 했다. 개혁신당은 이준석 당대표가 해외 출장이 있어 불참하지만 천하람 원내대표는 참석할 예정이다.)

During this meeting, President Lee is expected to share the outcomes of his recent state visit to China and the results of his scheduled visit to Japan on the 13th and 14th. Issues such as the administrative integration of Daejeon and South Chungcheong Province may also be discussed. (이번 회동에서 이 대통령은 최근 중국 국빈 방문 성과와 13~14일 예정된 일본 순방 결과를 공유할 것으로 보인다. 대전·충남 행정 통합 문제 등도 논의될 수 있다.)

item.title: People Power Party and Reform Party: "Will jointly propose special counsel bill if investigation into Kim Byeong-gi is insufficient" (국힘·개혁신당 “김병기 수사 미진하면 특검법 공동 발의”)
item.description:
People Power Party and Reform Party: "Will jointly propose special counsel bill if investigation into Kim Byeong-gi is insufficient" (국힘·개혁신당 “김병기 수사 미진하면 특검법 공동 발의”)

People Power Party leader Jang Dong-hyeok and Reform Party leader Lee Jun-seok met on the 13th and agreed that if the investigation into various allegations of misconduct by former Democratic Party floor leader Kim Byeong-gi is insufficient, the two parties will jointly propose a special counsel bill. (국민의힘 장동혁 대표와 개혁신당 이준석 대표가 13일 회동하고 김병기 전 더불어민주당 원내대표의 각종 비위에 대한 수사가 미진할 경우 양당이 함께 공동으로 특검법을 발의하기로 했다.)

Choi Bo-yun, chief spokesperson for the People Power Party, and Lee Dong-hoon, chief spokesperson for the Reform Party, announced that the two leaders reached this agreement after meeting at the National Assembly in Yeouido, Seoul, this morning. (최보윤 국민의힘·이동훈 개혁신당 수석대변인은 장 대표와 이 대표가 이날 오전 서울 여의도 국회에서 회동한 뒤 이 같은 사안에 대해 합의했다고 밝혔다.)

After the meeting between the two party leaders concluded, Chief Spokesperson Choi met with reporters and said, "We strongly urge compulsory investigation, including a detention investigation, regarding former floor leader Kim," adding, "If this is not properly accepted and the investigation is insufficient, the two parties plan to jointly propose a special counsel bill." (최 수석대변인은 양당 대표 회동 종료 후 기자들과 만나 “김 전 원내대표에 대해 구속 수사를 포함한 강제 수사를 강력히 촉구한다”며 “만약 이런 부분이 잘 받아들여지지 않고 수사가 미진한 경우 양당은 공동 특검법을 발의할 예정”이라고 말했다.)

He continued, "Evidence is being destroyed in real-time," and stated, "We will continue discussions in the National Assembly regarding the related procedural details." (이어 “실시간으로 증거가 인멸되고 있는 상황”이라며 “관련된 실무 절차는 원내에서 협의를 이어가겠다”고 했다.)

Former floor leader Kim faces up to 13 allegations, including receiving nomination-related donations and involvement in his second son's university transfer. The Democratic Party's ethics tribunal held a meeting on the 12th and decided to expel Representative Kim, who is embroiled in various suspicions, but former floor leader Kim immediately announced he would request a retrial. (김 전 원내대표는 공천 헌금 수수와 차남 대학 편입 관여 등 최대 13건의 의혹을 받고 있다. 민주당 윤리심판원은 12일 회의를 열어 각종 의혹에 휩싸인 김 의원에 대한 제명을 결정했지만 김 전 원내대표는 즉시 재심을 청구하겠다고 밝혔다.)

In addition, the two leaders stated they would "definitely push forward together" regarding the special counsel investigation into suspicions of the Unification Church's support for political circles and the truth behind the abandonment of the appeal in the Daejang-dong case. (이 밖에 두 대표는 통일교의 정치권 지원 의혹 특검과 대장동 항소 포기 진상 규명에 대해서도 “반드시 함께 추진하겠다”고 했다.)

The meeting was initially proposed as a joint meeting of the three opposition parties, but it became a meeting between the two parties as Cho Kuk, leader of the Cho Kuk Innovation Party, did not participate. Chief Spokesperson Lee said, "It's an open-door policy," and urged, "We urge Leader Cho to make a decisive decision and join the opposition party talks at any time." (이날 회동은 당초 야 3당 연석 회담 형식으로 제안됐으나 조국 조국혁신당 대표가 참여하지 않으면서 양당 회동이 됐다. 이 수석대변인은 “개문발차”라며 “언제든지 조 대표가 용단을 내려서 야당 회담에 함께해 주시길 촉구한다”고 했다.)

item.title: Kim Jae-seop: "If it's Yoon-agyein, then forget elections, we should just close up shop" Park Jeong-ha: "Breaking from Yoon is the start of renewal" (김재섭 “윤어게인이면 선거고 나발이고 문 닫아야” 박정하 “尹 절연이 쇄신 출발”)
item.description:
Kim Jae-seop: "If it's Yoon-agyein, then forget elections, we should just close up shop" Park Jeong-ha: "Breaking from Yoon is the start of renewal" (김재섭 “윤어게인이면 선거고 나발이고 문 닫아야” 박정하 “尹 절연이 쇄신 출발”)

<<>> On the 13th, People Power Party lawmaker Kim Jae-seop told the party leadership, "If they think the so-called 'Yoon-agyein forces' are the entirety of the support base, then there's no point in elections or anything else. We should just close up shop." ()

Appearing on SBS Radio that day, in response to a host's question about the People Power Party leadership's strategy to expand into the center, Rep. Kim stated, "If they exclude the entire (traditional) conservative base from the support base and mistakenly think those who are enthusiastic about former President Yoon Suk-yeol are the support base, then they are not qualified to be leaders." (김재섭 국민의힘 의원이 13일 당 지도부를 향해 “소위 말하는 ‘윤어게인 세력’이 지지층의 전부라고 생각하면 선거고 나발이고 없다. 그냥 문 닫아야 된다”고 말했다.)

Regarding former President Yoon's trial, Rep. Kim said, "Looking at the insurrection trial, from the viewer's perspective, isn't it really infuriating?" and added, "How can such talk happen in a courtroom? There's a feeling of great shame that someone like this was our leader." He continued, "We should rather step forward more, send the message that we chose the wrong leader, and ensure such things never happen again," and emphasized, "Before it's too late, we need to clearly distance ourselves from that and continue to send centrist-oriented messages." (김 의원은 이날 SBS 라디오에 나와 국민의힘 지도부의 중도 확장 전략에 대한 진행자의 질문에 “(전통적인) 보수층을 전부 지지층에서 배제해 놓고 윤석열 전 대통령에 대해 열광하는 사람들을 지지층으로 착각하면 그건 지도자 자격이 없는 것”이라며 이같이 밝혔다.)

Fellow party member Rep. Park Jeong-ha also said on MBC Radio that day, "The party's biggest problem, from start to finish, is the issue of its relationship with the 'Yoon-agyein' forces," and added, "Only if we can truly cleanly resolve the relationship with these people will all problems be solved." (김 의원은 윤 전 대통령 재판에 대해 “내란 재판을 보면 보는 사람 입장에서 진짜 짜증 나지 않느냐”며 “어떻게 저런 얘기를 재판장에서 하냐, (이런 분이) 우리의 지도자였다라는 것이 굉장히 부끄럽다는 얘기가 나온다”고 했다. 그러면서 “우리가 오히려 더 나서서 우리가 지도자를 잘못 뽑은 것 같고 다시는 이런 일들이 없게 하도록 하는 메시지가 더 많이 나가야 된다”며 “하루라도 늦기 전에 거기에 대해서 거리 두기를 확실하게 하고 계속 중도 지향적인 메시지를 내는 게 필요하다”고 했다.)

Rep. Park stated, "I believe that combining with Lee Jun-seok's Reform Party, creating opposition unity, and even merging parties all depend on how we define and resolve the issue of those 'Yoon-agyein' forces." (같은 당 박정하 의원도 이날 MBC 라디오에서 “당의 가장 큰 문제의 시작과 끝은 ‘윤어게인’ 세력과의 관계 문제”라며 “이 사람들과의 관계를 정말 깨끗하게 정리할 수 있어야 모든 문제가 다 해결될 것”이라고 말했다.)

Previously, on the 7th, People Power Party leader Jang Dong-hyuk apologized to the public, saying, "The martial law was a wrong means," but did not mention former President Yoon, leading to criticism inside and outside the party that it was a 'half-hearted apology'. Regarding this, in a KBS interview on the 12th, Leader Jang said, "I don't think it's a matter to be evaluated based on whether specific words are included or not," and added, "The sincerity of my message regarding past issues will be revealed by what kind of actions I show going forward." (박 의원은 “이준석 개혁신당과 결합하고 야권 연대를 만들고 심지어는 당을 합치는 것까지도 그 ‘윤어게인’ 세력을 어떻게 규정하고 정리할 건가에 달려있다고 본다”고 말했다.)

item.title: Cho Kuk Innovation Party: "Why is the ruling party delaying the Unification Church special probe? Very regrettable... Are they afraid of getting splashed?" (조국혁신당 “與 통일교 특검 왜 보류? 매우 유감…불똥 튈까 두렵나”)
item.description:
Cho Kuk Innovation Party: "Why is the ruling party delaying the Unification Church special probe? Very regrettable... Are they afraid of getting splashed?" (조국혁신당 “與 통일교 특검 왜 보류? 매우 유감…불똥 튈까 두렵나”)

Cho Kuk Innovation Party floor leader Seo Wang-jin expressed on the 13th that it was "very regrettable" that the Unification Church special probe bill was not passed during the National Assembly Legislation and Judiciary Committee's agenda coordination subcommittee meeting led by the Democratic Party of Korea. (조국혁신당 서왕진 원내대표는 13일 더불어민주당 주도의 국회 법제사법위 안건조정위에서 통일교 특검법안이 의결되지 않은 것에 대해 “매우 유감”이라고 말했다.)

During a party meeting at the National Assembly that day, Floor Leader Seo stated, "Are they perhaps afraid of sparks that might fly within their own (Democratic) party? Even if you're afraid of maggots, you still have to make the soy sauce paste," revealing his thoughts. (서 원내대표는 이날 국회 의원총회에서 “혹시라도 (민주당) 당내에 튈지 모를 불똥이 두려운 것인가. 구더기가 무서워도 장은 담가야 한다”며 이같이 밝혔다.)

He said, "It's hard to easily understand why they are now talking about additional discussions for the special probe into church-state collusion, while pushing forward with the second comprehensive special probe bill, which the People Power Party equally opposes and obstructs, for a plenary session on the 15th," adding, "The People Power Party is the subject of the truth investigation, not a negotiation partner." (그는 “국민의힘이 똑같이 반대하고 발목을 잡는 2차 종합특검은 15일 본회의에 상정하고 정교유착 특검은 왜 이제 와 추가 협의를 말하는지 쉽게 납득하기 어렵다”며 “국민의힘은 진실 규명 대상이지 협상 파트너가 아니다”라고 했다.)

Previously, the Democratic Party passed the second comprehensive special probe bill in a full committee meeting after going through the Legislation and Judiciary Committee's agenda coordination subcommittee the day before. However, the Unification Church special probe bill was temporarily put on hold during the agenda coordination subcommittee meeting. (앞서 민주당은 전날 법사위 안건조정위를 거쳐 2차 종합특검법안을 전체회의에서 의결했다. 그러나 통일교 특검법안은 안건조정위에서 일단 보류됐다.)

()

Amid this, the Cho Kuk Innovation Party's "We Go All the Way" committee stated on the same day regarding the government's bill to establish the Serious Crime Investigation Office (SCO) and the Public Prosecution Service, calling it "a camouflage tactic to cleverly extend prosecutorial vested interests," and "requested a fundamental re-examination of the so-called 'Second Prosecutors' Office Act'." (이런 가운데, 조국혁신당 끝까지간다위원회는 이날 정부의 중대범죄수사청(중수청)·공소청 설치법안에 대해 “검찰 기득권을 교묘하게 연장하려는 위장술”이라며 “제2검찰청법의 원점 재검토를 요청한다”고 밝혔다.)

There were also calls for the immediate resignation of Senior Presidential Secretary for Civil Affairs Bong Wook. Secretary Bong, a former deputy chief prosecutor at the Supreme Prosecutors' Office, plays a control tower role in leading judicial and prosecutorial reform issues within the Presidential Office. The Office of the Judicial System Secretary is under the Senior Secretary for Civil Affairs. (봉욱 민정수석의 즉각 사퇴요구도 나왔다. 대검 차장검사 출신인 봉 수석은 대통령실에서 사법·검찰 개혁 현안을 이끄는 컨트럴타워 역할을 하고 있ㄷ. 민정수석실 산하에 사법제도비서관실이 있다.)

Cho Kuk Innovation Party lawmaker Hwang Un-ha said, "(After reviewing the government bill) I couldn't help but be shocked and was extremely disappointed and angry," adding, "Secretary Bong bears the greatest responsibility for this situation. Fundamentally, Secretary Bong must be dismissed quickly, and a new control tower for prosecutorial reform must be established." (황운하 조국혁신당 의원은 “(정부법안을 보고) 경악을 금할 수 없었고 무척 실망과 분노가 컸다”며 “이렇게 된 것에는 봉욱 수석의 책임이 제일 크다. 근본적으로 봉 수석을 빨리 해임하고 새로운 검찰 개혁 컨트롤 타워를 만들어야 한다”고 했다.)

He further argued, "Since Secretary Bong has spent his entire life in the prosecution, prosecutorial DNA is ingrained in him, and he fundamentally cannot shed his prosecutorialist constitution," and reiterated, "The main culprit for this situation, I emphasize again, is Senior Secretary Bong Wook." (그러면서 “봉 수석은 평생을 검찰로 살아온 사람이다 보니까 검찰의 DNA가 몸에 배어 있고 검찰주의자의 체질을 도저히 벗어나지 못하고 있다”며 “이렇게 된 주범은 다시 한 번 강조하지만 봉욱 수석”이라고 주장했다.)

Floor Leader Seo Wang-jin said, "While there is no party-level discussion regarding Bong Wook's resignation, as Representative Hwang mentioned, he bears heavy responsibility as the top official in charge of the government's legislation on police reform," adding, "If no groundbreaking improvement plan emerges from the government level, holding him accountable will be unavoidable." <<>> (서왕진 원내대표는 “봉욱 사퇴와 관련해 당 차원 논의는 없으나 황 의원이 말한 것처럼 경찰개혁 정부 입법의 최고 책임자로 책임이 무겁다”며 “정부차원에서 획기적인 개선 방안 나오지 않는다면 책임 묻지 않을 수 없다”고 했다.)

item.title: Government Confirms, "3 Out of 4 Agencies Responsible for Kim Jong Un's Security and Guard Duty Have Replaced Their Heads" (정부, “김정은 경호·호위 담당 4곳 중 3곳 책임자 교체")
item.description:
Government Confirms, "3 Out of 4 Agencies Responsible for Kim Jong Un's Security and Guard Duty Have Replaced Their Heads" (정부, “김정은 경호·호위 담당 4곳 중 3곳 책임자 교체")

The government has confirmed that the heads of three out of the four agencies responsible for the security and guard duty of North Korean State Affairs Commission Chairman Kim Jong Un have been replaced within the last 2-3 years. (김정은 북한 국무위원장의 경호·호위를 담당하는 기관 4곳 중 3곳의 책임자가 최근 2∼3년새 교체된 것으로 정부가 확인했다.)

According to the '2025 North Korea Key Personnel Information' and '2025 North Korea Agency Personnel Directory' released by the Ministry of Unification on the 13th, the director of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee Guard Department was replaced from Han Sun-chol to Song Jun-sol, and the director of the State Affairs Commission Guard Bureau was replaced from Kim Chol-gyu to Ro Kyong-chol. The Guard Commander was changed from Kwak Chang-sik to Ra Chol-jin. The Guard Department was confirmed to have maintained its existing director, Kim Yong-ho. (통일부가 13일 공개한 ‘북한 주요 인물정보 2025’와 ‘북한 기관별 인명록 2025’에 따르면 노동당 중앙위원회 호위처 처장이 한순철에서 송준설로, 국무위원회 경위국장이 김철규에서 로경철로 각각 교체됐다. 호위사령관은 곽창식에서 라철진으로 바뀌었다. 호위국은 기존 김용호 국장 그대로 유지된 것으로 확인됐다.)

The specific timing and reasons for their replacements have not been confirmed, it is reported. Based on publicly available materials, predecessors Han Sun-chol and Kim Chol-gyu were in their positions until the 70th Anniversary Victory Day in July 2023, and Kwak Chang-sik last appeared in public materials as Guard Commander in May 2022. The National Intelligence Service reported to the National Assembly Intelligence Committee in October 2024 that North Korea was raising its security alert level, conscious of assassination threats against Kim Jong Un. A Ministry of Unification official stated, "While the exact timing or reasons for the replacements have not been confirmed, it is noticeable that the heads of sensitive positions responsible for the security and guard duty of the 'supreme dignity' have been replaced in a relatively short period." (이들의 구체적 교체 시점과 이유에 대해서는 확인되지 않았다고 한다. 공개자료 기준으로 전임자 한순철·김철규는 2023년 7월 70주년 전승절까지 자리에 있었고, 곽창식은 2022년 5월에 공개 자료에서 마지막으로 호위사령관으로 등장했다. 국정원은 2024년 10월 국회 정보위원회에서 북한이 김정은 암살 위협 등을 의식해 경호 수위를 격상하고 있다고 보고했었다. 통일부 당국자는 “정확한 교체 시기나 사유는 확인되지 않았지만 ‘최고존엄’의 경호·호위를 책임진 민감 직위자가 비교적 짧은 시간에 물갈이 된 것이 눈에 띈다”고 했다.)

Excluding Kim Jong Un, Ri Pyong-chol, a party advisor in charge of munitions policy who was once evaluated as the top figure in the military hierarchy, is presumed to have been dismissed from his positions as a member of the Political Bureau Presidium of the Party and vice chairman of the Central Military Commission. There are observations that he stepped back from the front line due to reasons such as old age. Prominent inter-Korean affairs figure Kim Yong-chol, an advisor, was included as a candidate member of the Political Bureau until last year, but this time he is marked as 'presumed' to be a candidate member. A Ministry of Unification official said, "As Kim Yong-chol was omitted from the list of the Kim Young-nam State Funeral Committee and showed differences in treatment and protocol compared to candidate members at public events, there is a possibility he is not a candidate member." The number of First Vice Ministers of the Ministry of National Defense and First Deputy Chiefs of the General Staff is presumed to have increased from one to two. In the 2024 personnel directory, Kim Jong-gwan (General) was the First Vice Minister of the Ministry of National Defense, but this time it is reflected as Kang Sun-nam (General) and Cha Yong-bom (Lieutenant General). For the First Deputy Chief of the General Staff, Jong Myong-do (Colonel General) was joined by an addition of Kim Yong-bok (Colonel General). (김정은을 제외하고 한때 군부 서열 1위로 평가됐던 리병철 당 군수정책담당 고문은 당 정치국 상무위원과 중앙군사위 부위원장 직위에서 해임된 것으로 추정됐다. 고령 등의 이유로 일선에서 물러난 것이라는 관측이다. 대표적인 대남통인 김영철 고문은 작년까지 정치국 후보위원에 포함됐으나 이번에는 후보위원으로 ‘추정’된다고 표기됐다. 통일부 당국자는 “김영철이 김영남 국가장의위원회 명단에서 빠지는 등 공개 행사에서 후보위원들과 처우·의전에 차이를 보여 후보위원이 아닐 가능성도 있다”고 했다. 국방성 제1부상과 총참모부 제1부총참모장은 인원이 1명에서 2명으로 늘어난 것으로 추정됐다. 2024년 인명록에서는 김정관(대장)이 국방성 제1부상이었으나 이번에는 강순남(대장)과 차용범(중장)으로 반영됐고, 총참모부 제1부총참모장은 정명도(상장)에 김영복(상장)이 추가됐다.)

Changes in the heads of military educational institutions were also confirmed around the time of the 80th Party Founding Anniversary military parade. The president of Kim Il Sung Political University changed from Ju Song-nam to Ju Myong-chol; the dean of Kim Chaek Air Force University from Sim Jae-eul to Kang Kyong-ho; the principal of Kang Kon Military Academy from Paek Kang-hyok to Rim Chang-nam; and the principal of O Jin-u Artillery Command Academy from Yu Chang-son to Kim Kwang-su. Within the Workers' Party, Kim Jae-ryong, Jon Hyon-chol, and Pak Thae-song were removed from secretary positions, and Ri Hi-yong, Kim Tok-hun, and Choe Tong-myong filled those positions. Among the party's specialized departments, the Culture and Arts Department is presumed to have been abolished. Among the external organizations for South Korea-related affairs, the Korea-Asia Pacific Peace Committee, which remained in the North Korean power structure diagram as of the end of 2024, was also omitted this time. A Ministry of Unification official stated, "The Asia-Pacific Peace Committee also performed civilian diplomacy functions in the Asia-Pacific region besides South Korea-related work, so it was classified as maintained in the 2024 power structure diagram, but based on various information obtained since then, it is presumed to have been abolished." However, the Korea Committee for Overseas Compatriots, an external organization handling overseas compatriot affairs, is known to be involved in some South Korea-related work abroad. (군 교육기관 수장의 교체도 당 창건 80주년 열병식 계기에 확인됐다. 김일성정치대학 총장은 주송남에서 주명철로, 김책명칭공군대학 학장은 심재을에서 강경호로, 강건명칭종합군관학교 교장은 백강혁에서 림창남으로, 오진우명칭포병종합군관학교 교장은 유창선에서 김광수로 각각 바뀌었다.노동당에서는 김재룡, 전현철, 박태성이 비서직에서 빠지고 리히용, 김덕훈, 최동명이 그 자리를 채웠다. 당 전문부서 중에는 문화예술부가 폐지된 것으로 추정됐다. 대남 외곽기구 중 2024년 말 기준 북한 권력기구도에서 남아 있던 조선아시아태평양평화위원회도 이번에는 빠졌다. 통일부 당국자는 “아태평화위는 대남 업무 외에 아태 지역의 민간외교 기능도 수행해 2024년 권력기구도에 존치로 분류했으나 이후 파악된 여러 정보를 바탕으로 폐지된 것으로 추정했다”고 했다. 다만, 재외동포업무 외곽기구인 조선해외동포원호위원회가 해외에서 일부 대남업무에 관여하는 것으로 알려졌다.)

The government also did not include information related to Kim Jong Un's daughter, Kim Ju-ae, in the 'North Korea Key Personnel Information' published this time. The reason given is that while her public activities have been shown in North Korean media, her name has not yet been called out by North Korean media. The latest 'North Korea Key Personnel Information', 'North Korea Agency Personnel Directory', and 'North Korea Power Structure Diagram' distributed this time reflect changes in the organizational structure and personnel of North Korean party, government, and military organizations based on information confirmed through public materials such as North Korean state media reports up to the end of December last year. (정부는 이번에 펴낸 ‘북한 주요 인물정보’에도 김정은의 딸 김주애 관련 정보는 기재하지 않았다. 북한 매체에 공개활동을 하는 모습이 드러나고는 있으나 아직 북한 매체가 이름을 호명하고 있지 않고 있다는 이유에서다. 이번에 배포된 최신 ‘북한 주요 인물정보’와 ‘북한 기관별 인명록’, ‘북한 권력기구도’는 작년 12월 말까지 북한 관영매체 보도 등 공개자료로 확인된 사항을 기준으로 북한 당·정·군 조직의 직제 개편 및 구성원 변화 사항을 반영한 것이다.)

item.title: 58% of the Public Says "Korean Society is Corrupt"... 1% Admits to "Having Made an Improper Solicitation in the Past Year" (국민 58% “한국 사회 부패했다”… 1%는 “지난 1년간 부정 청탁 해봤다”)
item.description:
58% of the Public Says "Korean Society is Corrupt"... 1% Admits to "Having Made an Improper Solicitation in the Past Year" (국민 58% “한국 사회 부패했다”… 1%는 “지난 1년간 부정 청탁 해봤다”)

A public opinion survey result shows that 57.6% of the public thinks 'Korean society is corrupt'. (국민 57.6%가 ‘한국 사회가 부패했다’고 생각한다는 여론조사 결과가 나왔다.)

According to survey results conducted by the Anti-Corruption and Civil Rights Commission in June and October-November of last year and released on the 13th, 57.6% of the general public responded that Korean society is corrupt. 33.5% of respondents said it was average, and 8.8% said it was clean. (국민권익위원회가 지난해 6월과 10~11월 시행해 13일 공개한 조사 결과에 따르면, 일반 국민의 57.6%는 한국 사회가 부패했다고 답했다. 보통이라는 응답자는 33.5%였고, 청렴하다는 응답자는 8.8%였다.)

44.4% of domestic experts and 32.7% of businesspeople also viewed Korean society as corrupt. In contrast, only 8.8% of foreigners and 5.3% of public officials answered that Korean society is corrupt, while 60.3% of foreigners and 50.0% of public officials said it is clean. (국내 전문가의 44.4%, 기업인의 32.7%도 한국 사회가 부패했다고 봤다. 반면 외국인은 8.8%, 공무원은 5.3%만이 한국 사회가 부패하다고 답했고, 외국인 60.3%, 공무원 50.0%는 청렴하다고 답했다.)

In a survey asking respondents to evaluate the integrity of various sectors of society—including political parties/legislature, judiciary, administrative agencies, public enterprises, private companies, media, religious organizations, civic groups, education, culture/arts/sports, and labor unions/organizations—the average general public respondent viewed all sectors as corrupt. On a 10-point scale, the general public gave political parties/legislature 2.42 points, the judiciary 2.63 points, and the media 2.69 points, viewing these sectors as the most corrupt. Religious organizations (3.33 points), labor unions/organizations (3.63 points), administrative agencies (3.82 points), and civic groups (3.93 points) followed. Public enterprises (4.11 points), culture/arts/sports (4.29 points), private companies (4.41 points), and education (4.49 points) received relatively better evaluations. (정당·입법부, 사법부, 행정기관, 공기업, 민간 기업, 언론, 종교 단체, 시민 단체, 교육계, 문화·예술·체육계, 노조·노동 단체 등 사회 각 분야별로 청렴도를 평가해보게 한 조사에서는 일반 국민 응답자는 평균적으로 모든 분야에 대해 부패했다고 보는 것으로 나타났다. 10점 만점 조사에서 일반 국민은 정당·입법부에 대해서는 2.42점, 사법부에 대해서는 2.63점, 언론에 대해서는 2.69점을 매겨, 이 분야들이 가장 부패했다고 봤다. 종교 단체(3.33점), 노조·노동 단체(3.63점), 행정 기관(3.82점), 시민 단체(3.93점)가 그다음이었다. 공기업(4.11점), 문화·예술·체육계(4.29점), 민간 기업(4.41점), 교육계(4.49점)는 비교적 낫다는 평가를 받았다.)

Domestic businesspeople and experts also generally evaluated all sectors of society as corrupt. Businesspeople particularly viewed the media (3.40 points), political parties/legislature (3.53 points), the judiciary (3.61 points), and religious organizations (3.97 points) in that order as corrupt, and saw the sectors they are part of—public enterprises (4.72 points) and private companies (4.70 points)—as less corrupt, following the education sector (4.95 points). Domestic experts viewed political parties/legislature (2.78 points), the media (3.08 points), the judiciary (3.15 points), and religious organizations (3.54 points) in that order as corrupt, and saw the education sector (4.97 points), which includes themselves, as less corrupt. (국내 기업인과 전문가들도 사회 전 분야에 대해 대체적으로 부패했다고 평가했다. 기업인들은 특히 언론(3.40점)과 정당·입법부(3.53점), 사법부(3.61점), 종교 단체(3.97점) 순으로 부패했다고 봤고, 교육계(4.95점)에 이어 자신들이 포함된 공기업(4.72점)과 민간 기업(4.70점)이 덜 부패했다고 봤다. 국내 전문가들은 정당·입법부(2.78점)와 언론(3.08점), 사법부(3.15점), 종교 단체(3.54점) 순으로 부패했다고 봤고, 자신들이 포함된 교육계(4.97점)가 덜 부패했다고 봤다.)

In contrast, foreigners and public officials generally viewed all sectors of Korean society as clean. However, foreigners viewed religious organizations (6.16 points), political parties/legislature (6.22 points), and private companies (6.37 points) as relatively less clean, and culture/arts/sports (6.92 points), public enterprises (6.80 points), and education (6.80 points) as the cleanest. Public officials viewed the media (5.34 points), political parties/legislature (5.32 points), and the judiciary (5.61 points) as less clean, and saw the administrative agencies (6.70 points), which include themselves, along with education (6.56 points) and public enterprises (6.50 points) as the cleanest. (반면 외국인과 공무원들은 한국 사회 모든 분야가 대체적으로 청렴하다고 봤다. 그러면서도 외국인들은 종교 단체(6.16점), 정당·입법부(6.22점), 민간 기업(6.37점)이 비교적 덜 청렴하고, 문화·예술·체육계(6.92점), 공기업(6.80점), 교육계(6.80점)가 가장 청렴하다고 봤다. 공무원들은 언론(5.34점)과 정당·입법부(5.32점), 사법부(5.61점)가 덜 청렴하고, 자신들이 포함된 행정기관(6.70점)을 비롯해 교육계(6.56점)와 공기업(6.50점)이 가장 청렴하다고 봤다.)

39.1% of the general public, 30.8% of experts, and 22.6% of businesspeople answered that public officials are corrupt. In contrast, only 8.8% of foreigners and 1.1% of public officials answered that public officials are corrupt. 70.0% of public officials said they themselves are clean. (일반 국민의 39.1%, 전문가의 30.8%, 기업인의 22.6%는 공무원이 부패했다고 답했다. 반면 외국인은 8.8%, 공무원은 1.1%만이 공무원이 부패했다고 답했다. 공무원 70.0%는 자신들이 청렴하다고 했다.)

Among public officials, the general public viewed firefighting officials as the cleanest with a score of 6.80 out of 10, and prosecutors/Ministry of Justice officials as the most corrupt with a score of 3.18. Public officials in construction/housing/land (3.42 points), police officials (4.31 points), and military/manpower/defense officials (4.31 points) also received evaluations of being corrupt. The evaluations by domestic businesspeople and experts were largely similar. (일반 국민은 공무원 중에서는 10점을 만점으로 봤을 때 소방공무원들이 6.80점으로 가장 청렴하다고 봤고, 검찰·법무부 공무원들이 3.18점으로 가장 부패했다고 봤다. 건축·건설·주택·토지 분야 공무원(3.42점), 경찰공무원(4.31점), 병무·국방 분야 공무원(4.31점) 등도 부패했다는 평가를 받았다. 국내 기업인과 전문가의 평가도 대체로 비슷했다.)

1.0% of the general public responded that they had made an improper solicitation to a public official in the past year. 0.3% of foreigners also said they had made an improper solicitation to a Korean public official during the same period. Furthermore, 1.2% of the general public and 0.3% of foreigners answered that they had provided money, valuables, or entertainment to a public official in the past year. Among domestic businesspeople, there were no respondents who said they had made an improper solicitation or provided money/valuables/entertainment to a public official in the past year. (일반 국민의 1.0%는 최근 1년 새 공직자에게 부정 청탁을 해봤다고 답했다. 외국인 0.3%도 같은 기간 한국 공직자에게 부정 청탁을 해봤다고 했다. 또 일반 국민의 1.2%, 외국인 0.3%는 최근 1년 새 공직자에게 금품이나 접대를 제공했다고 답했다. 국내 기업인 가운데서는 최근 1년 새 공직자에게 부정 청탁을 하거나 금품·접대를 제공했다는 응답자가 없었다.)

This survey was conducted in June and October-November of last year targeting 1,400 members of the general public aged 19 and over, 700 domestic corporate executives, 630 experts in education, politics, law, media, civic groups, religion, and culture/arts, 400 foreigners working at foreign diplomatic missions in Korea, chambers of commerce, and foreign-invested companies, and 1,400 public officials. (이번 조사는 지난해 6월과 10~11월 19세 이상 일반 국민 1400명과 국내 기업 임원 700명, 교육·정치·법조·언론·시민단체·종교·문화예술 분야 전문가 630명, 주한 외국 공관과 상공회의소, 외국 투자 기업에 근무하는 외국인 400명, 공무원 1400명을 대상으로 이뤄졌다.)

item.title: Lee Seok-yeon: "It would be better to withdraw the second special counsel... It could be seen as political retaliation" (이석연 “2차 특검 거둬들이는 게 좋아...정치 보복으로 비칠 수도”)
item.description:
Lee Seok-yeon: "It would be better to withdraw the second special counsel... It could be seen as political retaliation" (이석연 “2차 특검 거둬들이는 게 좋아...정치 보복으로 비칠 수도”)

Lee Seok-yeon, Chairman of the National Integration Committee, stated on the 13th regarding the 'Second Comprehensive Special Counsel Act' being pursued by the Democratic Party of Korea, "I would like to say it would be good to exercise restraint, it would be better to withdraw it." (이석연 국민통합위원장은 13일 더불어민주당이 추진하는 ‘2차 종합특검법’과 관련해 “자제하는 게 좋다, 거둬들이는 게 좋겠다고 말씀드리고 싶다”고 밝혔다.)

Speaking at the Kwanhun Forum held at the Korea Press Center in Jung-gu, Seoul, Chairman Lee said, "While punishment for insurrectionist forces is necessary, the three special counsels have investigated as much as they could, and the insufficient parts have been transferred to the National Investigation Headquarters for continued investigation." (이 위원장은 이날 서울 중구 한국프레스센터에서 열린 관훈토론회에서 “내란 세력에 대한 단죄는 필요하지만, 3대 특검이 파헤칠 만큼 파헤쳤고 미흡했던 부분은 국가수사본부로 이관해 계속 수사하고 있다”며 이같이 말했다.)

Chairman Lee, who is evaluated as having a moderate conservative leaning, supported President Lee Jae-myung in the last presidential election and was appointed as Chairman of the National Integration Committee in September last year. (중도 보수 성향으로 평가되는 이 위원장은 지난 대선에서 이재명 대통령을 지지했고, 지난해 9월 국민통합위원장에 임명됐다.)

He said, "If we go back into a special counsel situation, it could easily be seen as political retaliation. The line between punishing insurrectionist forces and political retaliation is ambiguous," adding, "President Lee Jae-myung also privately said during his candidacy, 'I will end political retaliation during my term.'" (그는 “다시 특검 정국으로 가면 자칫 정치 보복으로 비칠 수 있다. 내란 세력 단죄와 정치 보복 사이의 선이 모호하다”며 “이재명 대통령도 후보 시절 사적으로 ‘정치 보복은 내 대에서 끊겠다’고 하셨다”고 했다.)

He continued, "If one is determined to frame someone with a crime, evidence can always be found. No one can be safe," and stated, "The path to integration opens when those who have power show magnanimity and exercise inclusiveness." (그러면서 “죄를 씌우려 마음먹으면 증거는 있는 법이다. 누구도 무사할 수 없다”며 “가진 자, 힘 있는 자가 아량을 보이고 포용력을 발휘할 때 통합의 길도 트인다”고 했다.)

Chairman Lee also criticized the Democratic Party's push to newly establish the crime of 'distortion of law', calling it "a disgrace for a civilized nation and a law that should not be enacted." (이 위원장은 민주당의 법왜곡죄 신설 추진에 대해서도 “문명국의 수치이고, 해서는 안 되는 법”이라고 비판했다.)

He said, "The very act of conceiving and pushing such a law is incomprehensible to me as a legal professional, a constitutional scholar, and as a citizen," and urged, "Please withdraw at least this bill." (그는 “이런 법을 발상하고 밀어붙인다는 것 자체가 법조인으로서, 헌법학자로서, 국민의 한 사람으로서 납득이 가지 않는다”며 “이 법안만은 거둬들여 달라”고 했다.)

Regarding the already enacted 'Insurrection Trial Division Act', which he opposed, he said, "I met with Democratic Party leader Jeong Cheong-rae, expressed my concerns, and discussed several unconstitutional aspects that needed to be removed," adding, "I believe the unconstitutionality has been eliminated because they were all supplemented." (그는 자신의 반대에도 이미 시행된 내란전담재판부법에 대해선 “민주당 정청래 대표를 만나 우려를 표명하면서 몇 가지 위헌성을 제거할 부분을 얘기했다”며 “다 보완했기 때문에 위헌성은 제거됐다고 본다”고 했다.)

However, he noted, "On a constitutional philosophy level, the philosophical debate remains as to whether creating a trial division after the fact to punish aligns with constitutional justice." (다만 “헌법 철학적 차원에서 사후에 재판부를 만들어 처단하는 것이 헌법적 정의에 합치되느냐 하는 철학적 논의는 남아있다”고 했다.)
